header.note: We are in the process of moving strings from Bloom.xlf to BloomMediumPriority.xlf and BloomLowPriority.xlf while trying very hard to preserve translations and approval status.

trans-unit.source: You can use elevenlabs.io to create sound effects if your book is non-commercial. Make sure to give credit to “elevenlabs.io”.
trans-unit.target: You can use elevenlabs.io to create sound effects if your book is non-commercial. Make sure to give credit to “elevenlabs.io”.

trans-unit.source: Add items that will show when the learner gets the correct answer. For example, you might add a text that says “Correct!” with a GIF of a dancing chicken.
trans-unit.target: Add items that will show when the learner gets the correct answer. For example, you might add a text that says “Correct!” with a GIF of a dancing chicken.

trans-unit.source: During game play, this item can be moved around.
trans-unit.target: During game play, this item can be moved around.

trans-unit.source: Place the targets in the places needed for the correct answer.
trans-unit.target: Place the targets in the places needed for the correct answer.

trans-unit.source: Untick this item if it is not part of the right answer
trans-unit.target: Untick this item if it is not part of the right answer

trans-unit.source: Keep all targets the same size so students can't use size as a clue.
trans-unit.target: Keep all targets the same size so students can't use size as a clue.

trans-unit.source: Type a sentence. The reader will be asked to sort the words.
trans-unit.target: Type a sentence. The reader will be asked to sort the words.

trans-unit.source: Add items that will show when the learner gets the wrong answer. For example, you might add a text that says “Try Again!”.\nIt is OK to have no correct or wrong answers. Just give the same positive reinforcement, like “Looks Nice!”.
trans-unit.target: Add items that will show when the learner gets the wrong answer. For example, you might add a text that says “Try Again!”.\nIt is OK to have no correct or wrong answers. Just give the same positive reinforcement, like “Looks Nice!”.

trans-unit.source: Drag the letters where they go
trans-unit.target: Drag the letters where they go

trans-unit.source: Drag the pictures where they go
trans-unit.target: Drag the pictures where they go

trans-unit.source: Drag the pictures to their shadows
trans-unit.target: Drag the pictures to their shadows

trans-unit.source: Drag the correct sound to matching word
trans-unit.target: Drag the correct sound to matching word

trans-unit.source: Drag the word to the matching image
trans-unit.target: Drag the word to the matching image

trans-unit.source: Match each image to a word
trans-unit.target: Match each image to a word

trans-unit.source: Drag the words where they go
trans-unit.target: Drag the words where they go

trans-unit.source: Check the box next to each correct answer.
trans-unit.target: Check the box next to each correct answer.

trans-unit.source: Place the correct image in the highlighted button, put other pictures in the other buttons. When it is time to play, Bloom will shuffle the order of buttons.
trans-unit.target: Place the correct image in the highlighted button, put other pictures in the other buttons. When it is time to play, Bloom will shuffle the order of buttons.

trans-unit.source: Type the correct word in the highlighted button, put other words in the other buttons. When it is time to play, Bloom will shuffle the order of buttons.
trans-unit.target: Type the correct word in the highlighted button, put other words in the other buttons. When it is time to play, Bloom will shuffle the order of buttons.

trans-unit.source: Please split or clear the existing recording in this text box before changing modes.
trans-unit.target: Please split or clear the existing recording in this text box before changing modes.

trans-unit.source: If you import this recording, it will replace all the audio for this text box.
trans-unit.target: If you import this recording, it will replace all the audio for this text box.

trans-unit.source: Use an external tool like Audacity. When you're done, use "Apply Timings File..."
trans-unit.target: Use an external tool like Audacity. When you're done, use "Apply Timings File..."

trans-unit.source: If Bloom's timing guesses based on pauses aren't accurate enough, you can use this more advanced tool instead. Keep in mind that this will erase any changes you've made. Check [here] for more details.
trans-unit.target: If Bloom's timing guesses based on pauses aren't accurate enough, you can use this more advanced tool instead. Keep in mind that this will erase any changes you've made. Check [here] for more details.

trans-unit.source: This will remove any adjustments you have made.
trans-unit.target: This will remove any adjustments you have made.

trans-unit.source: This is disabled because there is not a whole text box recording
trans-unit.target: This is disabled because there is not a whole text box recording

trans-unit.source: Click this to insert a "|" character into the text at the current cursor position. This character tells Bloom to introduce a new segment for the purpose of highlighting the text during audio playback. You can also just type the "|" character using your keyboard.
trans-unit.target: Click this to insert a "|" character into the text at the current cursor position. This character tells Bloom to introduce a new segment for the purpose of highlighting the text during audio playback. You can also just type the "|" character using your keyboard.

trans-unit.source: Bloom will hide these when you publish.
trans-unit.target: Bloom will hide these when you publish.

trans-unit.source: First, put the cursor in a box which has something to record.
trans-unit.target: First, put the cursor in a box which has something to record.

trans-unit.source: If you want to change this mode, first use the "Clear" button to remove your recording.
trans-unit.target: If you want to change this mode, first use the "Clear" button to remove your recording.

trans-unit.source: Record one sentence at a time. You can break up sentences using the `|` character.
trans-unit.target: Record one sentence at a time. You can break up sentences using the `|` character.

trans-unit.source: Record the whole text box in one take, or load in a recording.
trans-unit.target: Record the whole text box in one take, or load in a recording.

trans-unit.source: Import an mp3 recording of the whole text box.
trans-unit.target: Import an mp3 recording of the whole text box.

trans-unit.source: This is disabled because this box is not in `Record by Text Box` mode.
trans-unit.target: This is disabled because this box is not in `Record by Text Box` mode.

trans-unit.source: Open the timing file in a text editor. After you save your changes, click the "Apply Timings File" button.
trans-unit.target: Open the timing file in a text editor. After you save your changes, click the "Apply Timings File" button.

trans-unit.source: This is only enabled after doing a "Split" of a recording of the whole text box.
trans-unit.target: This is only enabled after doing a "Split" of a recording of the whole text box.

trans-unit.source: This lets you choose a file containing timings for aligning the audio with the text. The format of the file is tab-separated values, with the first column being the start time in seconds, and the second column being the end time in seconds. The third column is often a label, but it will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: This lets you choose a file containing timings for aligning the audio with the text. The format of the file is tab-separated values, with the first column being the start time in seconds, and the second column being the end time in seconds. The third column is often a label, but it will be ignored.

trans-unit.source: Control the order in which various boxes on the page are played back.
trans-unit.target: Control the order in which various boxes on the page are played back.

trans-unit.source: Select this if you want readers to be able to choose to read the book in this language.
trans-unit.target: Select this if you want readers to be able to choose to read the book in this language.

trans-unit.source: This is disabled because this language is currently shown in the book, so it is required.
trans-unit.target: This is disabled because this language is currently shown in the book, so it is required.

trans-unit.source: Select this if you want to include this audio.
trans-unit.target: Select this if you want to include this audio.

trans-unit.source: This is disabled because this book does not have any audio in this language.
trans-unit.target: This is disabled because this book does not have any audio in this language.

trans-unit.source: This book does not have any interactive activities.
trans-unit.target: This book does not have any interactive activities.

trans-unit.source: This is disabled because publishing interactive activities requires a subscription.
trans-unit.target: This is disabled because publishing interactive activities requires a subscription.

trans-unit.source: This book does not have any games.
trans-unit.target: This book does not have any games.

trans-unit.source: This is disabled because this book does not have any canvas elements that qualify as “comic-like”, such as speech bubbles.
trans-unit.target: This is disabled because this book does not have any canvas elements that qualify as “comic-like”, such as speech bubbles.

trans-unit.source: Select this if you want to list this book as a Comic Book. This only affects how the book is categorized, it does not affect the content of the book.
trans-unit.target: Select this if you want to list this book as a Comic Book. This only affects how the book is categorized, it does not affect the content of the book.

trans-unit.source: This is disabled because this book does not have any pages with motion enabled.
trans-unit.target: This is disabled because this book does not have any pages with motion enabled.

trans-unit.source: Select this if you want to show motion when the book is read in landscape mode.
trans-unit.target: Select this if you want to show motion when the book is read in landscape mode.

trans-unit.source: This is disabled because this book does not have any videos.
trans-unit.target: This is disabled because this book does not have any videos.

trans-unit.source: The videos in this book contain {N}
trans-unit.target: The videos in this book contain {N}

trans-unit.source: This is disabled because this collection has {no sign language selected}.
trans-unit.target: This is disabled because this collection has {no sign language selected}.

trans-unit.source: This is disabled because this book does not have any Talking Book recordings.
trans-unit.target: This is disabled because this book does not have any Talking Book recordings.

trans-unit.source: This is disabled because no “Talking Book Languages” are selected.
trans-unit.target: This is disabled because no “Talking Book Languages” are selected.

trans-unit.source: This is disabled because this book does not have any image descriptions in the primary language.
trans-unit.target: This is disabled because this book does not have any image descriptions in the primary language.

trans-unit.source: Select this if you want to list this book as accessible to the visually impaired in the primary language. This only affects how the book is categorized, it does not affect the content of the book.
trans-unit.target: Select this if you want to list this book as accessible to the visually impaired in the primary language. This only affects how the book is categorized, it does not affect the content of the book.

trans-unit.source: Do not show this book to the public yet. I will share its URL with reviewers for feedback.
trans-unit.target: Do not show this book to the public yet. I will share its URL with reviewers for feedback.

trans-unit.source: Consider whether you can distribute your book using the BloomPUB format instead of, or in addition to, the ePUB format.
trans-unit.target: Consider whether you can distribute your book using the BloomPUB format instead of, or in addition to, the ePUB format.

trans-unit.source: [Some Bloom features] are not supported by most or all ePUB readers.
trans-unit.target: [Some Bloom features] are not supported by most or all ePUB readers.

trans-unit.source: Most ePUB readers are very low quality ([see our research and recommendations]).
trans-unit.target: Most ePUB readers are very low quality ([see our research and recommendations]).

trans-unit.source: This feature is available only on the Windows version of Bloom. We apologize for the inconvenience.
trans-unit.target: This feature is available only on the Windows version of Bloom. We apologize for the inconvenience.

trans-unit.source: Why you should publish on the Web
trans-unit.target: Why you should publish on the Web

trans-unit.source: Bloom reduces images to a maximum size to make books easier to view over poor internet connections and take up less space on phones.
trans-unit.target: Bloom reduces images to a maximum size to make books easier to view over poor internet connections and take up less space on phones.

trans-unit.source: Fill the front cover with a single image
trans-unit.target: Fill the front cover with a single image

trans-unit.source: Using this option turns on the [Print Bleed](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bleed_%28printing%29) indicators on paper layouts. See [Full Page Cover Images](https://docs.bloomlibrary.org/full-page-cover-images) for information on sizing your image to fit.
trans-unit.target: Using this option turns on the [Print Bleed](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bleed_%28printing%29) indicators on paper layouts. See [Full Page Cover Images](https://docs.bloomlibrary.org/full-page-cover-images) for information on sizing your image to fit.

trans-unit.source: Languages to show in normal text boxes
trans-unit.target: Languages to show in normal text boxes

trans-unit.source: Page Themes are a bundle of margins, borders, and other page settings. For information about each theme, see [Page Themes Catalog](https://docs.bloomlibrary.org/page-themes-catalog).
trans-unit.target: Page Themes are a bundle of margins, borders, and other page settings. For information about each theme, see [Page Themes Catalog](https://docs.bloomlibrary.org/page-themes-catalog).

trans-unit.source: Note: some Page Themes may not know how to change the location of the Page Number.
trans-unit.target: Note: some Page Themes may not know how to change the location of the Page Number.

trans-unit.source: Normally, books use the front & back matter pack that is chosen for the entire collection. Using this setting, you can cause this individual book to use a different one.
trans-unit.target: Normally, books use the front & back matter pack that is chosen for the entire collection. Using this setting, you can cause this individual book to use a different one.

trans-unit.source: The {0} stylesheet of this book is incompatible with modern themes. Bloom is using it because the book is using the Legacy-5-6 theme. Click [here] for more information.
trans-unit.target: The {0} stylesheet of this book is incompatible with modern themes. Bloom is using it because the book is using the Legacy-5-6 theme. Click [here] for more information.

trans-unit.source: Bloom found a known version of {0} in this book and replaced it with a modern theme. You can delete it unless you still need to publish the book from an earlier version of Bloom.
trans-unit.target: Bloom found a known version of {0} in this book and replaced it with a modern theme. You can delete it unless you still need to publish the book from an earlier version of Bloom.

trans-unit.source: The {0} stylesheet of this book is incompatible with modern themes. Bloom is currently ignoring it. If you don't need those customizations any more, you can delete your {0}. Click [here] for more information.
trans-unit.target: The {0} stylesheet of this book is incompatible with modern themes. Bloom is currently ignoring it. If you don't need those customizations any more, you can delete your {0}. Click [here] for more information.

trans-unit.source: The {0} stylesheet of this book is incompatible with modern themes. Bloom is currently ignoring it. Click [here] for more information.
trans-unit.target: The {0} stylesheet of this book is incompatible with modern themes. Bloom is currently ignoring it. Click [here] for more information.

trans-unit.source: The selected page theme does not support the following settings.
trans-unit.target: The selected page theme does not support the following settings.

trans-unit.source: Extra space between pages near the book spine. Increase this for books with many pages to ensure text isn't lost in the binding. This gap is applied to each side of the spine.
trans-unit.target: Extra space between pages near the book spine. Increase this for books with many pages to ensure text isn't lost in the binding. This gap is applied to each side of the spine.

trans-unit.source: Smart spacing around text boxes. Works well for simple pages, but may not suit custom layouts.
trans-unit.target: Smart spacing around text boxes. Works well for simple pages, but may not suit custom layouts.

trans-unit.source: When you publish a book to the web or as an ebook, Bloom will flag any problematic fonts. For example, we cannot legally host most Microsoft fonts on BloomLibrary.org.
trans-unit.target: When you publish a book to the web or as an ebook, Bloom will flag any problematic fonts. For example, we cannot legally host most Microsoft fonts on BloomLibrary.org.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows where fonts have been used.
trans-unit.target: The following table shows where fonts have been used.

trans-unit.target: Font is not installed on this computer
